main event: On the evening of 16 January 1958, Mr. and Mrs. Columbus, Georgia, sighted two cigar-shaped objects with a bright orange to reddish glow over the Columbus-Ft Benning, Georgia area.
interesting points: The objects were described as cigar-shaped and followed each other closely., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., There was no reported sound from the objects., The objects faded out abruptly before completely disappearing., This sighting was one of several reported phenomena in the area during the weeks prior.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. from Columbus, Georgia
